F

Destructor method to ensure that the Apache Spark context is stopped when the GC destroys instances of this class.

L

Loads count of all words that have been processed.

S

saveCounts(String) - Method in class com.paulsena.WordCount

T

topTenWords() - Method in class com.paulsena.WordCount
Provides the top ten most common words found cumulatively across all books that have been processed by the service.
topTenWords(String) - Method in class com.paulsena.WordCount
Provides the top ten most common words found in a book that was already processed by the service.

W

WordCount - Class in com.paulsena
Apache Spark Word Counter Counts all occurrences of words from multiple books using Map Filter Reduce techniques.
